titleStmt.title: The state of the Irish affairs, for the honourable members of the Houses of Parliament; as they lye represented before them, from the Committee of Adventurers in London for Lands in Ireland, sitting at Grocers-Hall for that service.
titleStmt.author: Committee of Adventurers in London for Lands in Ireland.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Miller dwelling in the Black-Friers.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
